snippet.title: Command & Conquer™ Beyond the Battle: Part 1
snippet.description:
Sign up for the beta at http://bit.ly/ZCtkdD

In Part 1 of Beyond the Battle, we go back to our roots as we explore the formula that made Command & Conquer so popular and its design influences on the next installment. Join us behind the scenes for new reveals, never before seen footage, and exclusive interviews from the lead developers of Victory Games and Co-Founder of Westwood Studios, Louis Castle.
